document.full_text: kevin romero, 28, and sergio salcido, 25, who lived near the beach outside tijuana and worked at a brewery equipment company in san diego, were shot before 3 a.m. monday on their way to work.
document.title: the americas: mexico: two americans shot and killed in tijuana
lines_and_colors: kevin romero, 28, and sergio salcido, 25, who lived near the beach outside tijuana and worked at a brewery equipment company in san diego, were shot before 3 a.m. monday on their way to work.
